|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1806192300-1.0 Rev1.0sp4" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The [[TP-LINK RE300]] is identical to the [[TP-LINK Deco M3W]] aside :from the removal of the WPS button in the M3W. {{See also|TP-LINK Deco M3|TP-LINK Deco series}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://static.tp-link.com/2020/202010/20201021/Deco%20M3W(EU)%201.0_Datasheet.pdf 0_Datasheet] *[https://www.natthapol89.com/2020/06/tp-link-deco-m3w.html ''TP-LINK Deco M3W'' on '''natthapol89''']
